remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們不建議您改用`WebRequest`或其衍生的類別，適用於新的開發。We don't recommend that you use `WebRequest` or its derived classes for new development. 請改用類別。Instead, use the class. 是`abstract`基底類別。NET 的要求/回應模型從網際網路存取的資料。 is the `abstract` base class for .NET's request/response model for accessing data from the Internet. 使用要求/回應模型的應用程式可以要求來自網際網路的資料通訊協定無關的方式，應用程式的執行個體的運作類別時執行特定通訊協定子代類別的詳細資料要求。An application that uses the request/response model can request data from the Internet in a protocol-agnostic manner, in which the application works with instances of the class while protocol-specific descendant classes carry out the details of the request. 從特定的 URI，例如網頁伺服器上的應用程式傳送要求。Requests are sent from an application to a particular URI, such as a Web page on a server. URI 會決定適當的子系類別，以建立從一份子系的應用程式註冊。The URI determines the proper descendant class to create from a list of descendants registered for the application. 子系通常已註冊要處理特定的通訊協定，例如 HTTP 或 FTP，但可以向處理要求，以特定伺服器或伺服器上的路徑。 descendants are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such as HTTP or FTP, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server. 類別會擲回何時存取網際網路資源的時候發生錯誤。The class throws a when errors occur while accessing an Internet resource. 屬性是其中一個值，指出錯誤的來源。The property is one of the values that indicates the source of the error. 當是，則屬性包含接收自網際網路資源。When is , the property contains the received from the Internet resource. 因為類別是`abstract`類別的實際行為在執行階段的執行個體取決於所傳回的子系類別方法。Because the class is an `abstract` class, the actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by method. 如需預設值和例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱文件的子系的類別，例如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . > [!NOTE] > 使用方法來初始化新執行個體。Use the method to initialize new instances. 請勿使用建構函式。Do not use the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 如果建立的 WebRequest 物件的應用程式是以一般使用者的認證執行，應用程式將無法存取憑證安裝在本機電腦存放區，除非權限已經明確提供給使用者若要這樣做。If the application that creates the WebRequest object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立執行個體，並傳回回應。The following example shows how to create a instance and return the response. [!code-cpp[NclWebRequestSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebRequestSimple/CPP/webrequestget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclWebRequestSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebRequestSimple/CS/webrequestget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclWebRequestSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebRequestSimple/VB/webrequestget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定這個要求的快取原則。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache policy for this request.

value.span: 定義快取原則的 物件。

span.span: A object that defines a cache policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的快取原則和快取中要求的資源出現與否會決定是否可以從快取中擷取的回應。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 使用快取回的應，通常可改善應用程式效能，但會有風險的快取中的回應不符合伺服器上的回應。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 您可以在 Machine.config 組態檔中，或藉由設定，指定預設快取原則使用超文字傳輸通訊協定 (HTTP) 或安全超文字傳輸通訊協定 」 (HTTPS) 的 URI 配置要求的屬性。Default cache policy can be specified in the Machine.config configuration file or by setting the property for requests that use the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) or Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) URI scheme. 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則一份資源只會加入至快取。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 因此針對相同資源的另一個要求可以使用快取的複本，根據此要求的快取原則層級。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 Web 要求的快取原則。The following code example demonstrates setting the cache policy for a Web request. [!code-cpp[NCLSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#2)]

summary.span: 在子代類別中覆寫時，取得衍生自 類別的 Factory 物件，用來建立執行個體化的 以對指定的 URI 提出要求。

span.span: When overridden in a descendant class, gets the factory object derived from the class used to create the instantiated for making the request to the specified URI.

value.span: 方法傳回的衍生 類型。

span.span: The derived type returned by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓應用程式來判斷哪一個衍生的 factory 物件用來建立要求。This property allows an application to determine which derived factory object was used to create the request. 這個物件可能[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))或是[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))，但也可能是自訂的執行個體，衍生自。This object may be [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) or [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)), but it may also be a custom instance derived from . 這可讓應用程式，以判斷是否瀏覽器裝載[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)]用戶端或某個自訂的物件會處理 HTTP 要求和回應執行個體。This allows an application to determine whether the browser hosting [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)] client, or some custom object handles HTTP requests and responses for the instance. 方法可讓應用程式來設定其衍生至特定 URI 提出要求時型別會具現化。The method allows an application to configure which derived type will be instantiated when making a request to a specific URI. 建立者通常會以處理特定的通訊協定，這類 HTTP 或 HTTPS，向註冊，但可以向處理要求，以特定伺服器或伺服器上的路徑。 creators are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such HTTP or HTTPS, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server. 這是很有用，當多個衍生類型可以處理相同的通訊協定的要求。This is useful when more than one derived type can process requests for the same protocol. [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)]和更新版本的執行階段支援多個 HTTP 處理常式各自擁有不同的功能。The [!INCLUDE[sil3_first](~/includes/sil3-first-md.md)] and later runtime supports multiple HTTP handlers each having different capabilities. 例如，可能需要使用具像狀態傳輸 (REST) 的 web 服務[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95))雖然可能可以使用預設的 SOAP web 服務的處理常式[System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95))處理常式。For example, a web service that uses Representational State Transfer (REST) might require the [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.ClientHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.clienthttp(v=vs.95)) handler while a SOAP web service might be able to use the default [System.Net.Browser.WebRequestCreator.BrowserHttp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.net.browser.webrequestcreator.browserhttp(v=vs.95)) handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此原則用於此要求，如果存在下列條件：This policy is used for this request if the following conditions exist: - 沒有任何針對這個要求指定的屬性。There is no property specified for this request. - 電腦和應用程式組態檔沒有指定用來建立此要求的快取原則所適用的統一資源識別元 (URI)。The machine and application configuration files do not specify a cache policy that is applicable to the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) used to create this request. 快取原則會決定是否可以從快取，而非將要求傳送至資源的主機電腦獲得所要求的資源。The cache policy determines whether the requested resource can be taken from a cache instead of sending the request to the resource host computer. 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則一份資源只會加入至快取。A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream. 因此針對相同資源的另一個要求可以使用快取的複本，根據此要求的快取原則層級。So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the cache policy level for this request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 Web 要求的預設快取原則。The following code example demonstrates setting the default cache policy for Web requests. [!code-cpp[NCLSimpleCache#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLSimpleCache#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#15)]

Proxy 目前支援和。Proxies are currently supported by and . 屬性會從 app.config 檔案中讀取 proxy 設定。The property reads proxy settings from the app.config file. 如果沒有設定檔，則會使用目前使用者的 Internet Explorer (IE) proxy 設定。If there is no config file, the current user's Internet Explorer (IE) proxy settings are used. 如果屬性設定為 null，所有後續的執行個體所建立的類別或方法就不需要的 proxy。If the property is set to null, all subsequent instances of the class created by the or methods do not have a proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會註冊服務要求的子系。The method registers descendants to service requests. 子系通常已註冊要處理特定的通訊協定，例如 HTTP 或 FTP，但可以向處理要求，以特定伺服器或伺服器上的路徑。 descendants are typically registered to handle a specific protocol, such HTTP or FTP, but can be registered to handle a request to a specific server or path on a server. 已註冊的預先註冊的保留類型包括下列各項：The pre-registered reserve types already registered include the following: - `http://` - `https://` - `ftp://` - `file://` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和方法。For more information, see the and methods. 不允許重複的前置詞。Duplicate prefixes are not allowed. 傳回`false`如果嘗試註冊重複的前置詞。 returns `false` if an attempt is made to register a duplicate prefix. > [!NOTE] > 類別預設會註冊以 HTTP 和 HTTPS 配置的服務要求。The class is registered to service requests for HTTP and HTTPS schemes by default. 嘗試註冊不同這些結構描述的子系將會失敗。Attempts to register a different descendant for these schemes will fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`當要求所做的變更物件應該如果要求的伺服器上，驗證使用目前登入使用者的認證。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 用戶端應用程式，這是在大部分情況下想要的行為。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 對於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式，而不是使用這個屬性，您通常設定屬性，以代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
